response.original_title: Matt Kayes Lake Escapes - Barbel, Catfish & Carp
response.overview: In this far-reaching programme, Matt initially fishes in Le Mans, France, for carp and catfish, and tries a spot of night-fishing. Back in the UK, at Symonds Yat in Monmouthshire, he proudly catches barbel and chub. We then to Italy where Matt finds a variety of carp, and lastly to Spain, where he and his team hook some monstrous catfish. Along the way, we are introduced to a number of European fishing experts and some wacky new baits, and we witness some very exciting moments, most notably Matt's epic struggle with a seven-foot, 150lb catfish.
response.title: Matt Kayes Lake Escapes - Barbel, Catfish & Carp
